name: Virtual Reality Demonstrator
description: A tool for creating spatial presentations in VR

name: AR Physicalizations
description: Using Vuforia AR SDK, building a system for combining biogeochemistry data with physical geospatial models

name: CPU Raytracer
description: A raytracer from scratch written in C++ on up to two cores with multiple samples per pixel

name: Generative Adversarial Networks
description: A comparison of the CycleGAN and DualGAN algorithms for style transfer applications

name: Yelp Rating Predictions
description: Applying the slope one algorithm to predict restaurant ratings, based on the Yelp Open Dataset

name: Bucketz
description: An iOS game built with Swift and SpriteKit

name: Path Planning Game
description: An interactive program demonstrating A* path planning and probabilistic roadmaps. Written in Java with Processing, which is based on OpenGL

name: Particle Simulation
description: A particle system capable of complex behavior, such as billboarding, streaking, texturing, and more written in Processing
